column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Absolutely love this place. Starting from the airy aesthetics to the countless choices of bakery items
column2: everything about Common Bond has really impressed me! Common Bond reminds me of my times in super bougie Parisian cafes. I could tell every pastry item has been made with care and all the ones I've tried have been delicious. I recommend the fig and goat cheese macaron (it's seasonal so get it fast!) and the alfajor cookie!
